document.title: Document
document.author: Author
document.title_search: Explore a rich repository of documents from subjects at Thuy Loi University, shared by the students themselves.
document.description_search: This is where you can easily search and find learning support materials in many fields. Search from lectures, outlines to in-depth research documents, all contributed by the student community. You can also share your knowledge, helping to enrich and connect the learning community.

learning_progress.title: Learning Progress
learning_progress.author: Author
learning_progress.start_learning: Plan your semester in style with Ocean, your smart and thoughtful AI assistant!
learning_progress.start_learning_description: With Ocean, you just need to enter your personal requirements, everything from arranging subjects to optimizing time is handled neatly, helping you study comfortably without worrying about overlapping schedules. Let Ocean take care of the study schedule, you can rest assured to explode in every class!

feedback.contact_message: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your opinion. Your feedback is the inspiration for us to continuously improve, bringing better learning experiences to all students. Please enter your contact information so that we can send you detailed feedback. We are committed to keeping all your personal information confidential!
feedback.name: Name

policy.title: Terms & Policies
policy.intro: OceanMind is an online platform designed to support students in discussions, document sharing, personal work management, communication, and portfolio building. By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with the Terms and Policies provided below.

service_rights.title: Service Usage Rights
points: Users have the right to register an account to use discussion services, share documents, manage work schedules, and create portfolios.
Users commit to providing accurate and complete information when registering an account and updating personal information when changes occur.

content_rules.title: Content Regulations
points: Users are not allowed to post or share content that violates laws, social ethics, or has offensive, threatening, discriminatory, religious, or harassing nature.
OceanMind reserves the right to remove or edit posts, documents, or information that does not comply with website regulations.

data_collection.title: Data Collection
points: We collect personal information from users including but not limited to name, email address, phone number, login information, and other related information when users register an account or use website services.

data_usage.title: Data Usage
points: Collected information will be used to provide services, support users, improve experience, and send notifications related to website activities.
We may use information to send newsletters, advertisements, or new product/service notifications if users agree to receive them.

ocean_ownership.title: OceanMind Ownership
points: All content, features, and software of OceanMind, including designs, logos, source code, and data, are owned by OceanMind or licensed for legal use.

user_ownership.title: User Ownership
points: Users own the content they upload to the website (including posts, documents, portfolios, etc.) and have the right to edit, delete, or share this content, provided it does not violate the website's Terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions about our Terms and Policies, please contact us via:
contact.address: Address: 604 Truong Dinh Street - Dong Da - Ha Noi
